description:
Johana Sánchez
----------------------
Chemist / Founder of Django Girls Colombia
Copilot with Argentina in Python
----------------------
Official presentation of Django Girls Colombia in the community of Python Colombia where we will share all the results of the management and events that we have organized at the national level.
----------------------

https://twitter.com/ellaquimica
https://github.com/ellaquimica
https://www.facebook.com/EllaQuimica/
https://www.facebook.com/un.ser.libre.brilla
https://www.linkedin.com/in/johanna-sanchez-a93076139/



--------------------------------------------

About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018 - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.


- The Python Software Foundation -
- EAFIT University - http://www.eafit.edu.co/
- HDE - https://www.hde.co.jp/en/
- MONOKU - https://monoku.com/
- SIHSA - https://www.sihsa.co/
- PSL Latam - https://www.psl.com.co/


Follow us

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pyconcolombia
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconcolombia
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pyconcolombia/
Telegram: https://t.me/pyconcolombia
LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/pycon-colombia/

More About PyCon Colombia in http://www.pycon.co

Join us at our next conference, February 8 - 10, 2019 in Bogota, Colombia. More information in http://www.pycon.co
title: Johana Sánchez - Django Girls Colombia: Technological inclusion and results achieved in 2017
